Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Slopes)

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Kokiri Shop#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Fairy Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Silver Rupee Wood Beam Back

HC (Malon).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that Bongo Bongo really hates the cold.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #9# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Pocket Egg#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Jail Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for Ganon's Castle#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Spirit Trial)

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Pocket Egg#.
